snippet.title: Madden 22 | Official Reveal Trailer | Gameday Happens Here
snippet.description:
Gameday will never be the same. 

Experience the thrilling suspense of NFL football with Dynamic Gameday in Madden NFL 22.

From the newly refreshed Franchise, Dynamic Gameday powered by Next Gen Stats, and Home Field Advantage, Madden 22 is the new standard in sports gaming. 

Pre-Order MVP Edition Now & Play Early on August 17: http://x.ea.com/68978

#madden22 
#maddennfl22
#gamedayhappenshere

CREDITS
BRS Kash – “Oh No (Madden 22 Version)” eSingle
